management.name: Management
management.description: Management group for corporate management resources, such as logs, monitoring, update manager, defender, policies, compliance, etc.

identity.name: Identity
identity.description: Management group for corporate identity resources. Application identities should be part of the application resource group.

connectivity.name: Connectivity
connectivity.description: Management group for corporate connectivity resources. Application connectivity resources should be part of the application resource group.

corporate.name: Corporate
corporate.description: Management group for corporate resources, such as internal-use software like SAP, Priority, and other resources required by the corporation, but not for managing Azure.

development.name: Development
development.description: Management group for the development team.

quality_assurance.name: Quality Assurance
quality_assurance.description: Management group for the QA team.

demo.name: Demo
demo.description: Management group for demos used by sales and marketing teams.

shared_services.name: Shared Services
shared_services.description: Management group for shared services resources.
